
```{r}
set.seed(24)
num_subj <- 200
num_bef <- 10
Z <- rep(rbinom(n = num_subj, size = 1, prob = .5),3)
delta <- -.5
theta_s <- 0.5
alpha <- 22
beta <- 1.2
beta_bar <- 1
sigma <- .9
sigma_b <- 1.5
dists_1 <- matrix(rexp(n = num_subj*num_bef,
                       rate = 1),
                  nrow = num_subj,
                  ncol = num_bef)
dists_2 <- matrix(rexp(n = num_subj*num_bef,
                       rate = 1),
                  nrow = num_subj,
                  ncol = num_bef)
dists_3 <- matrix(rexp(n= num_subj*num_bef,
                       rate = .5),
                  nrow = num_subj, ncol = num_bef)
dists <- rbind(dists_1,dists_2,dists_3)
colnames(dists) <- stringr::str_c("BEF_",1:ncol(dists))
dists <- as_tibble(dists)

dists <- dists %>% mutate(id=expand.grid(subj=1:num_subj,time = 1:3)$subj,
                         time = expand.grid(1:num_subj,time = 1:3)$time) %>%
    gather(contains("BEF"),key = "BEF", value="Distance") %>% 
    filter(Distance<=5)

X <- dists %>% group_by(id,time) %>% summarise(Exposure = sum(exp(-Distance/theta_s)))
X_bar <- X %>% group_by(id) %>% summarise(MN_Exposure = mean(Exposure)) %>% 
    mutate(subj_int = rnorm(n = num_subj,
                            mean = 0,
                            sd = sigma_b))

X_diff <- X %>% left_join(X_bar,by='id') %>% mutate(X_diff = Exposure - MN_Exposure)

epsilon_ij <- rnorm(n = num_subj * 3, mean = 0, sd = sigma)

eta <- alpha + Z * delta + beta*X_diff$X_diff + 
    X_diff$MN_Exposure*beta_bar + 
    X_diff$subj_int 

y <- alpha + Z * delta + beta*X_diff$X_diff + 
    X_diff$MN_Exposure*beta_bar + 
    X_diff$subj_int  + epsilon_ij 

Z <- matrix(Z,ncol=1)
```

```{r}
dists_crs <- matrix(dists %>% arrange(id,time) %>% select(Distance) %>% pull(),nrow=1)
u_crs <- as_tibble(xtabs(~id + time,data = dists, addNA = T)) %>% 
    mutate(id = as.integer(id),time = as.integer(time)) %>% 
    arrange(id,time) %>% 
    mutate(start = replace(dplyr::lag(cumsum(n)),is.na(dplyr::lag(cumsum(n))),0)+1,
           stop = cumsum(n)) %>% select(start,stop) %>% mutate(start = start - 1,
                                                               stop = stop - 1)

subj_mat1 <- as.matrix(Matrix::fac2sparse(as.factor(X_diff$id)))
subj_n <- rep(1/3,num_subj)
W <- t(subj_mat1)
```


```{r}
devtools::load_all(recompile=T)
iter_max <- 500 
warmup <- 250
sink("~/Desktop/Routput.txt")
fit <- stapdnd_glmer2.fit(y = y, z = Z,w = W,
                      u_s = as.matrix(u_crs),
                      subj_matrix = subj_mat1,
                      subj_n = matrix(subj_n,ncol=1),
                      stap_par_code = c(length(y),1,1,1,num_subj),
                      dists_crs = dists_crs,
                      adapt_delta = .65,
                      warmup = warmup, 
                      iter_max = iter_max,
                      max_treedepth = 10,
                      seed = 2341,
                      diagnostics = 1)
sink()
```

```{r}
thetas <- seq(from = -3, to =3.0, by =0.05);
customthetas <- seq(from = X_bar$subj_int[1] - 1, to= X_bar$subj_int[1] + 1, by = 0.05)
sink("~/Desktop/Routput.txt")
out <- test_grads_glmer(y,Z,W,
                        true_b = as.matrix(X_bar$subj_int,ncol=1),
                        beta_bar,beta,
                        dists_crs,as.matrix(u_crs),
                        subj_mat1,as.matrix(subj_n,ncol=1),
                        customthetas,
                        c(length(y),1,1,1,num_subj),
                        seed = 1241)
sink()

transform_thetas <- function(x) 10 / (1 + exp(-x))
tibble(theta = (customthetas), energy = out$energy) %>% ggplot(aes(x=theta,y=energy)) + geom_line() + theme_bw()  + geom_vline(aes(xintercept = X_bar$subj_int[1]) ,linetype = 2) 

tibble(theta = (customthetas), grad = out$grad) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x=theta,y=grad)) + geom_line() + theme_bw()  +
    geom_vline(aes(xintercept = X_bar$subj_int[1]),linetype = 2) 

```
